title: Who was Paul on Eminem’s albums? - Quora

response.answer_text: Paul Rosenberg is a manager from Detroit MI who works with many acts including blink 182 and he was eminems first manager who has also became a close friend and helped him set up his own label,shady records,he has been the subject for many skits titled “Paul” that has appeared on most albums since the slim shady lp were he is usually heard giving Eminem a hard time about his lyrics being explicit or his behaviour,and when i first heard him on the mmlp1 he was telling em that the lyrics are so explicit that he couldn't sell his album,Eminem then proceeds with his song the way i am which was one of the best on the album,(so sometimes the manager is wrong)
